first.title: Learn wherever you are.
first.description: With this application you will be able to complement your knowledge no matter where you are.

second.title: Don't lose notes.
second.description: Take notes of the classes seen and review them whenever you want without the risk of losing them.

third.title: Climb in the ranking.
third.description: Bring out your competitiveness and get ranking points by completing classes or taking exams.
